game.name: GUN X GUNNER
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op
game.shortDescription: GUN X GUNNER is a free-to-play, round-based first-person-shooter where up to eight players face off in fast-paced free-for-alls. Choose new equipment, weapons, and powerful, game-altering augments between rounds in an ever-evolving competition. It’s time to get good, get lucky, and GUN X GUNNER.
game.shortDescriptionEn: GUN X GUNNER is a free-to-play, round-based first-person-shooter where up to eight players face off in fast-paced free-for-alls. Choose new equipment, weapons, and powerful, game-altering augments between rounds in an ever-evolving competition. It’s time to get good, get lucky, and GUN X GUNNER.
